data.title: Marco Ferreri: The Director Who Came from the Future (2007)
data.meta_description: The documentary focuses on Marco Ferreri and shows an unconventional man, extreme, provocative in ways, always a step ahead in its work, and often considered a visionary and experimental. The documentary honors the memory of a filmmaker too soon forgot that left an indelible mark in the seventh art.
data.text:
This 98-minute documentary was made well after Marco Ferreri had passed away but it takes interviews he gave throughout his life and allows him to talk about his style, his films and what cinema is to him.

MARCO FERRERI: THE DIRECTOR WHO CAME FROM THE FUTURE is a very entertaining documentary and especially if you're not too familiar with the director's work. I'm rather new to his work but I'm glad I watched this documentary early on because it gave me a lot of titles I want to check out now but it also educated me on what Ferreri saw in cinema.

The interviews with those who worked with him, including Gerard Depardieu, are wonderful and each of them addâ€¦
